articles.title: ICC official reacts to terror threat, says 'a comprehensive security plan is in place' for T20 World Cup - The Times of India
articles.description: Cricket News: The ICC collaborates closely with host countries, the West Indies and the USA, to address reported terror threats to the Men's T20 World Cup. Security
